name: Obsidian Azure
description:
Obsidian Azure Reference photo

You have spent most of your life supporting the war effort: harvesting mana crystals from the dangerous ravines that border the Edge of the World. 
Skilled at climbing, your duty is to climb the cliffs and extract the crystals. But a twist of fate could change everything… War approaches, and with it rebellion. 

Warnings: 
Contains themes of death / violence 

This a WIP submission of a story designed for the interact-if text-based story jam 2022 (ranked). Word count: ~4500

I love reading IF and would love to get better at writing IF too, any constructive critism would help a lot!
